attributes.action: Suspend UK membership of CPTPP pending a free and fair UK public vote
attributes.additional_details: Because when we joined the EU, a public vote had to be held and won, so it is only fair and correct that the same procedure happens with UK CPTPP membership.
attributes.background: When we first joined the EC, a public vote had to be held and passed with a 50% vote in favour of membership. It is only right and fair that UK membership of the CPTPP is suspended pending satisfaction of the same democratic procedure.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635583
Hold referendums on joining new trade blocks eg CPTPP

In addition, the Government has said that the agreement is not expected to come into force until 2024:
https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/the-uk-and-the-comprehensive-and-progressive-agreement-for-trans-pacific-partnershipcptpp
